entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Deprecation of `ListView` in .NET 10 MAUI #28699
    .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [.NET10] Update MAUI Samples to not use TableView and to Indicate alternatives #28698
    .NET 10.0-preview4
  • Deprecation of TableView in .NET MAUI for .NET 10 #28697
    .NET 10.0-preview4
  • .NET MAUI Multi-Project sln only includes shared project when created using CLI #28695
  • [iOS 18.3.2] ImageButton no longer working with RelayCommand in ViewModel #28692
  • iOS crash randomly when navigations several times #28691
  • [iOS] ViewCell with ContextActions causes memory leaks #28689
    Backlog
  • Could not find a valid Xcode app bundle #28688
  • Not a Bug - .Net Maui compilation fails on paired mac #28686
  • TaskCanceledException on IStreamImageSource.GetStreamAsync(CancellationToken userToken) #28684
    .NET 9 SR7
  • TargetInvocationException Occurs When Selecting Header/Footer After Changing ItemsLayout in CV2 #28678
    .NET 9 SR6
  • Visibility Property Not Updating as Expected in .NET MAUI #28677
    .NET 9 SR5.1
  • Android - Dynamic Updates to CollectionView Header/Footer and Templates Are Not Displayed #28676
    .NET 9 Servicing

Closed

  • [Test] Write test for [iOS] Back-navigation with swipe-back navigates back twice - fix #28572
    .NET 9 SR7
  • [iOS] Back-navigation with swipe-back navigates back twice #28446
    .NET 9 SR5.1
  • [Android] Disposed GesturePlatformManager still be called when dispatchTouchEvent() #28564
    .NET 9 SR7
  • Image Source Handler class files are missing in .NET 9. #28687
  • The content size remains unchanged when it visibility changes at runtime #14441
  • Label not sized correctly on Android #27614
    .NET 9 SR6
  • dotnet publish command for MAUi App (.NET 9) is giving MSB1008 error - Only one folder can be specified #28498
  • Cannot create project #28437

PullRequests

Created

  • [xamlc] convert {OnPlatform} to OnPlatformExtension<T> #28700
  • [iOS] Trigger OnNavigatedTo method when hide the nav bar and using sw… #28694
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Fixed iOS cell resizing issue #23319 #28690
    community ✨, area-controls-listview
  • Fix to wrong CancellationToken on IStreamImageSource.GetStreamAsync #28685
    community ✨, area-controls-image
  • [iOS] Fix Crash When Using FlyoutItem with DataTemplate and Binding #28683
    area-xaml, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Replace obsolete iOS BeginImageContextWithOptions #28682
    platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-controls-general, .NET 9 SR7
  • Fixed Footer not displayed at the Bottom When EmptyView in CV2 #28681
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Feature Matrix UITest Cases for CollectionView EmptyView Feature #28679
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] CV2 ItemsLayout update #28675
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, collectionview-cv2

Merged

  • [net10.0] [ci] Update arcade to latest #28701
  • [ci] Update arcade to latest #28696
    area-infrastructure, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [Android, iOS] Dynamically setting SearchHandler Query property does not update text in the search box #28400
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Flyout Menu Icon disappears from Window Title Bar after Navigation #28240
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [2025/03/24] Candidate - In Flight Branch #28560
    p/0, area-infrastructure, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Testing] Allow to use Theme changes actions on Catalyst #28181
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [Testing] Implement methods to manage alerts from UITests on Windows #28177
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [net10.0] Merge main to net10 #28674
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • Fixed the Label not sized correctly on Android #28215
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6

Updated

  • [iOS] Label LinebreakMode (TailTruncation) for FormattedText does't work in CollectionView after scroll - fix #28151
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, area-controls-label, collectionview-cv2
  • [iOS] CollectionView footer sizing when source is empty - fix #28610
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • [iOS] Inherit AccessibilityTraits for views wrapped inside a WrapperView #27088
    platform/iOS 🍎, do-not-merge, community ✨, area-controls-general, t/a11y, .NET 9 SR6
  • Experiment with making HWV AOT-compatible #27381
    proposal/open, area-controls-hybridwebview, .NET 10 Planning
  • [blazorwebview] align `SupportedOSPlatform` attribute with templates #25073
    proposal/open, area-blazor, .NET 10 Planning
  • Reduce Confusion of DateSelected Event in DatePicker (Split Into DateSelected and DateChanged) #16153
    proposal/open, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker, stale, .NET 10 Planning
  • [Testing]Fix TappingDoneClosesKeyboard #28668
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix: Prevent Duplicate MapSource Invocations on setting Image's Source to Local File Paths #28405
    platform/android 🤖, area-image, community ✨, t/perf
  • Fix iOS CollectionView not reacting properly to orientation changes #28670
    platform/iOS 🍎, p/0, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • Update CommunityToolkit.Maui & Mvvm reference in template #28510
    p/0, area-templates, .NET 9 SR6
  • [.Net10] [Proposal] [iOS] Shell.AutoResizeTabBarIcons #28128
    t/enhancement ☀️, proposal/open, area-controls-shell, community ✨, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • Add Binding.ConverterCulture #28595
    t/breaking 💥, proposal/open, area-xaml, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [Android][NET 10] Fix: Ensure Image consumes touches properly #28429
    proposal/open, platform/android 🤖, area-image, community ✨, area-gestures

    t/breaking 💥, proposal/open, area-controls-dialogalert, area-controls-dialog, .NET 10.0-preview4

  • [iOS] CarouselView with CarouselViewHandler2 make app crash when Loop="False" and user scroll to the last position - fix #26868
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, collectionview-cv2, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR7
